label: 城南の離宮
説明文: Also known as Toba dono or Toba no rikyū. Located in southern Kyoto (in Minami and Fushimi wards, Kyōto City).  It was built in the late 11th century as a detached palace for Shirakawa Tennō after he retired in the vicinity of Toba. (Nihon rekishi chimei taikei Vol. 27: Kyōtoshi no chimei. Heibonsha. 431) [鳥羽殿、鳥羽離宮、白河天皇]
